You will see the signature for each feature
/images/eiffelstudio/browsing_tools/feature_tool_signature.png
The feature tool (
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/tool_feature_icon.png ) gives a summary of all written-in features of the currently edited class. They are listed in a
10_feature_tree.xml tree representation , where the nodes are the feature clauses, and the leaves are the features. In the tool mini-toolbar, a
20_new_feature_command.xml new feature command is available, which adds a new feature in the edited class.
